title: Black screen when loading game. NEED HELP!!!
body: On Macbook. Keep black screen when loading game. Cannot enter the game. From 1st Feb. Rly need help!!!!

replies.body: I'm seeing some Mac users suggesting "When the screen turns black, keep pressing space bar+enter+delete". Try that? I don't use a Mac so don't ask lol. Let me know if that works. If you can, test it in a Custom match first so you don't get penalized.

Hello QG Mint,

Have you tried any troubleshooting steps at all? It may seem strange but here are a few simple things you can try.

1. Load up a custom game, and when the screen goes black, try pressing the "return" (or enter) key on your keyboard and see if it loads.
2. Try changing your DNS settings following [this guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#mq4), and try loading into a custom game again and see if the problem is resolved.
3. Attempt to repair the client using [this guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974#mq6) and try again.

Let me know if any of those steps worked for you or if you have any other questions.
